caption.p: Skin elasticity values recorded before treatment ( t = 0) and after a one-week treatment with the gels under investigation. Statistically significant differences ( p < 0.05) were observed after one week for the following comparisons: gel C vs. gels A, B, B1, D and D1; gel D vs. gels A, B, B1 and C; gel D1 vs. gels A, B, B1 and C.
